Name: Cave In
Special: Heroes and monsters start incapaciated randomly

Name: Chagnar's Wrath
Special: Skeleton Warriors (add 3 if none) have stun melee

Name: Den of Thieves
Special: Monsters steal 100 gold when they hit

Name: Rampage!
Special: Overseer chooses a monster type that will take AN extra melee shot

Name: Stoneloth Shields
Special: Dungeon monsters gain Retaliation. Add 1 dungeon monster if none.

Name: Vaiel's Archers
Special: Before resolution, add two centaurs or one cerberus at hero start zone and engage in battle.

Name: Help from Beyond
Special: Heroes choose 3 monsters types; they cannot appear in next room

Name: Horde of Vermin
Special: Before resolution, add 6 non-frenzy zombies to hero start zone

Name: The Fires of Xokarst
Special: Infernal monsters take extra fireball shot. Add 1 if none.
